app.title: Social Support Application
app.description: Apply for social support by filling out the form below. Use AI assistance to help with writing your situation descriptions.

form.name: Full Name
form.financialSituationPlaceholder: Describe your current financial situation, including income, expenses, debts, and any financial challenges you're facing...
form.employmentCircumstancesPlaceholder: Describe your employment situation, job search challenges, or difficulties in maintaining employment...
form.reasonForApplyingPlaceholder: Explain why you need social support and how it would help improve your situation...

aiAssist.error: Unable to generate suggestion at this time. Please try again later.
aiAssist.description: Click 'Help Me Write' on any field to get AI-powered suggestions for improving your description.
aiAssist.tipDescription: The AI suggestion is a starting point. Feel free to edit it to best reflect your personal situation.

prompts.financialSituation: Help me write about my current financial situation
prompts.employmentCircumstances: Help me describe my employment circumstances
prompts.reasonForApplying: Help me explain why I need financial assistance

contexts.financialSituation: User needs to describe financial circumstances for government support application
contexts.employmentCircumstances: User needs to describe employment situation for government support application
contexts.reasonForApplying: User needs to explain why they need financial assistance

successMessage: Your application has been submitted successfully. We will review your information and contact you soon.
